      • clipString

        public static java.lang.String clipString​(java.lang.String input,
                                          int numChars,
                                          boolean appendEllipses)
        Reduces the input string to the number of chars, or its length if the number of chars exceeds the input string's length
        Parameters:
        input - The string to clip
        numChars - the number of leading chars to keep (all others will be removed)

      • trimOrPadString

        public static java.lang.String trimOrPadString​(java.lang.String str,
                                               int len,
                                               char pad)
        Trims string to its last X characters. If string is too short, is padded at the front with given char
        Parameters:
        str - - string to trim
        len - - length of desired string. (must be positive)
        pad - - character to pad with
